abilities.name: Hitsuji Gumo Tidal Wave
abilities.description: Creates a massive tidal wave of power-draining soap bubbles that can sweep an entire room, weakening anyone caught in them

abilities.name: Soap Bubble Creation
abilities.description: Creates soap bubbles that can 'clean' the strength off opponents, leaving them smooth, slippery, and nearly unable to move

abilities.name: Bubble Shield
abilities.description: Condenses bubbles together to create a defensive shield against attacks

weaknesses.description: The bubbles created by this Devil Fruit can be easily washed away by water, and enemies who have been weakened by the bubbles can be returned to normal by being washed with water
Even strong wind can blow away the bubbles created by this fruit

keyMoments.description: Kalifa uses Hitsuji Gumo Tidal Wave to attempt to counter Nami's Fata Morgana illusions
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the full scale and power of the Awa Awa no Mi's bubble creation abilities

keyMoments.description: Nami overcomes the bubble weakness by using her climate abilities to wash away the bubbles and counter with lightning
keyMoments.significance: Shows that the Awa Awa no Mi's power can be countered by weather manipulation and strategic thinking
